COMPONENT.name: dbms_error_message
COMPONENT.versshortremarks: Returns error msg for last DBMS statement
COMPONENT.script:
/* ** Name: dbms_error_message - Returns error message for last DBMS statement. ** ** Description: ** This procedure returns an error message for the last DBMS statement ** executed. If there was no error, an empty string is returned. ** ** Called By: ** check_out, customer_maintenance, error_handler, video_detail. ** ** Parameters: ** (None) ** ** Returns: ** Error message for last DBMS statement. */
procedure dbms_error_message () = begin if iierrornumber != 0 then return 'Error code is ' + varchar(iierrornumber) + '. DBMS specific error number is ' + varchar(iidbmserror) + '.'; else return ''; endif; end;

COMPONENT.name: video_graphic
COMPONENT.versshortremarks: Show video graphic
COMPONENT.script:
/* ** Name: video_graphic - Show graphic for video. ** ** Description: ** This displays a graphic for a video. ** ** Called By: ** video_detail, via openframe. ** ** Parameters: ** ** Returns: ** (None) ** ** User Events: ** 'UpdateGraphic' sent by video_detail to update graphic. ** 'UpdateTitle' sent by video_detail to update title. */
initialize ( ) = declare parent_frame = FrameExec; /* Parent frame (video_detail frame) */ enddeclare
begin parent_frame = FrameExec(CurFrame.ParentFrame); end
on userevent 'UpdateGraphic' = begin vid_graphic_bitmap = BitmapObject(CurFrame.MessageObject); CurFrame.Flush(); CurFrame.IsAutoSized = TRUE; CurFrame.WindowVisibility = WV_VISIBLE; CurFrame.BringToFront(); end
on userevent 'UpdateTitle' = begin CurFrame.WindowTitle = CurFrame.MessageVarchar; end
on windowclose = begin parent_frame.SendUserEvent(eventname = 'GraphicClosed'); return; end
on windowvisible = begin if parent_frame.WindowVisibility = WV_ICON then parent_frame.WindowVisibility = WV_VISIBLE; parent_frame.BringToFront(); endif; end

row.name: insert_before_current_row
delete_current_row
delete_all_rows
